function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Overwhelmed traditional hospitals leading to makeshift hospital development","category":"Healthcare Infrastructure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in futureproofing requirements","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence of virus stability on temperature","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disposal protocols for medical waste","category":"Waste Management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of futureproofing in asset management practice","category":"Business Continuity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliability of electrical infrastructure supporting icu ventilators and equipment","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate medical gas supply network","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of contagion due to inadequate video and audio surveillance","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation in makeshift hospitals may increase infection risk of opportunistic airborne transmission.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate pressure regime in ventilation systems may lead to contaminated air escaping from isolation rooms.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Features facilitating rapid conversion of large public venues","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Requirement for specific space and infrastructure for medical facilities","category":"Healthcare Infrastructure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cross-infection risk in the built environment","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Makeshift hospitals not designed for medical care purposes","category":"Healthcare Infrastructure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inflexible hospital designs","category":"Healthcare Infrastructure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid conversion of public venues into healthcare facilities","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adaptive design strategies for public venues","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of increased infection in houses with several occupants","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Living in small apartments with several occupants in highly populated neighbourhoods predisposes the afro-american community to acquire sars cov-2.","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ugs urban green spaces in buenos aires city is below the recommended value by the world health organization, and unevenly distributed.","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heterogeneous distribution of ugss causing large areas to be further than a ten minutes walking Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy and security risks due to constraints of iot devices, such as low power and computational speed, and the need for energy-efficient security algorithms.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Security and privacy issues related to iot and cognitive radio cr technology","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large amount of data collected from sensors can lead to privacy and security risks if not handled properly.","category":"Communication
